DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the effects of non-invasive neuromodulation, transcranial direct current stimulation (tDCS), on brain function in individuals with obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD). This study is focused on the mechanism(s) by which brain stimulation might change the functioning of regions implicated in OCD, and thereby inform possible future therapeutic uses.
DOC.brief_title: Neurocircuitry of Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder: Modulation by Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation
